statements: SELECT * FROM tax_exemption_status;
SELECT id, name, type FROM tax_exemption_status WHERE exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, type FROM tax_exemption_status WHERE type = 'Non-profit';
SELECT * FROM tax_exemption_status ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, exemption_status FROM tax_exemption_status WHERE type = 'Charity' AND exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, type, exemption_status FROM tax_exemption_status WHERE exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM tax_exemption_status ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, name, type FROM tax_exemption_status WHERE type = 'Property' AND exemption_status = TRUE ORDER BY name LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS total_exemptions FROM tax_exemption_status GROUP BY name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, name, type, exemption_status FROM tax_exemption_status WHERE type = 'Sales' AND exemption_status = TRUE ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM individuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, is_tax_exempt FROM individuals WHERE is_tax_exempt = TRUE;
SELECT name FROM organizations WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals WHERE is_tax_exempt = FALSE;
SELECT id, name, is_tax_exempt FROM organizations WHERE is_tax_exempt = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM individuals WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND is_tax_exempt = TRUE;
SELECT name, id FROM organizations WHERE name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, is_tax_exempt FROM individuals WHERE is_tax_exempt = FALSE OR name = 'John' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE is_tax_exempt = TRUE AND id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT name FROM organizations WHERE id = 2 OR name = 'Alpha' AND is_tax_exempt = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT name, tax_exemption_status FROM individuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals WHERE tax_exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, entity_type, exemption_timestamp FROM tax_exemption ORDER BY exemption_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE tax_exemption_status = FALSE;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals WHERE tax_exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, id FROM organizations WHERE tax_exemption_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM tax_exemption WHERE entity_type = 'individuals' ORDER BY exemption_timestamp DESC;
SELECT name FROM individuals UNION SELECT name FROM organizations;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT name, tax_exemption_status FROM organizations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals WHERE tax_exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM organization_exemptions WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT individual_id, exemption_reason FROM individual_exemptions ORDER BY individual_id, expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM individuals WHERE tax_exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, tax_exemption_status FROM organizations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, name, tax_exemption_status FROM organizations WHERE tax_exemption_status = FALSE ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name AS individual_name, exemption_reason AS reason FROM individual_exemptions WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT organizations.id, organizations.name AS org_name, organization_exemptions.exemption_reason FROM organizations INNER JOIN organization_exemptions ON organizations.id = organization_exemptions.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT name, tax_exemption_status FROM organizations WHERE tax_exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM individual_tax_exemptions WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT entity_type, action, timestamp FROM tax_exemption_audit_log WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT name, tax_exemption_status FROM organizations WHERE tax_exemption_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, name FROM individuals WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM individual_tax_exemptions ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT entity_type, entity_id, action, timestamp FROM tax_exemption_audit_log WHERE action = 'UPDATED';
